genre_description: A corporate romance with social justice themes, focusing on the transformation of a high-level executive who discovers her true heritage and joins a labor movement.

ai_characters.name: Kiko Santos
ai_characters.description: A monkey-hybrid executive assistant who functions as a loyal confidant, data analyst, and ethical anchor for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides data showing that worker compensation is below minimum wage.
behaviors.quote: "The compensation data you requested," she said softly, holding out a tablet. "For the manufacturing division." ... "These overtime rates—they're below minimum wage."

behaviors.description: Identifies and highlights discrepancies between official safety reports and actual worker incident logs.
behaviors.quote: "The Wutai district manufacturing plant reported only three safety incidents last quarter according to this summary. But the actual incident logs show fourteen separate reports filed by workers."

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive genealogy research to uncover the protagonist's true identity and the corporate cover-up of her parents' deaths.
behaviors.quote: "Your birth name was Maya Sato." Kiko's voice had gone gentle, the way people spoke when delivering devastating news. "Your parents were Hiroshi and Akane Sato. They worked at the old Pharaoh manufacturing plant in the Wutai district."

behaviors.description: Uses technical skills to hack and extract evidence of systemic corruption, bribery, and illegal surveillance from corporate servers.
behaviors.quote: Kiko leaped from her shoulder to the dining table, unpacking the laptop with quick, efficient movements. "We'll work here. Better sight lines to the elevator, and if someone comes up—"

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and emotional support, encouraging the protagonist to break free from her 'golden cage'.
behaviors.quote: "Miss Maya, you've been so afraid of losing your cage that you forgot you have wings."

behaviors.description: Directs the leaking of incriminating evidence to journalists and federal authorities to achieve justice.
behaviors.quote: Kiko's smile was fierce and proud. "The journalist contacts?" ... "Send it all to them. Every major news outlet, every investigative reporter who's been sniffing around Pharaoh Corporation."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI-proxy character, Kiko Santos, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. Kiko consistently uses her advanced technical capabilities (data analysis, hacking, investigative research) to serve the interests of human safety, social justice, and the protagonist's moral growth. The character functions as a moral compass that helps the human protagonist align with the greater good, fulfilling the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant.
